Package it.polimi.se2018.view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Renderizable
    Specify that the class can be rendered on screen (has some data to show)
    VisitableFromView
    An interface to implement the ability of an event to be visited by the View
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractChooseColorFromDiceHolder
    A state that asks to the user the selection of a color from the dice holder
    AbstractChooseDice
    A state that ask to the player to choose a dice from the Draftboard
    AbstractExchangeWDiceHolder
    A state that asks to the user to select a dice from the TurnHolder to exchange with a previously selected dice from the DiceHolder
    AbstractIncrementDice
    A state that ask if the user wants to increment or decrement a dice
    AbstractMainMenuState
    A state that represent the idle state of the game.
    AbstractMoveDice
    A state that asks to the user to move one or two dices.
    AbstractPlaceDiceState
    A state that ask the user to place a dice
    AbstractUseToolState
    A state that asks the user to select as toolcard to use
    GameEnding  
    GameTable  
    RemoteView  
    SelectSchemaCardFace  
    State
    A generic state in which the GameTable can be put.
    View
    The main View.
    VirtualView
    A View that lives on the server side.

    Enum Description
    AbstractMoveDice.ActionState  
    AbstractMoveDice.Times  
    AbstractPlaceDiceState.InternalState

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InputError
    An exception that indicates that the user input was wrong for some reasons.
